did.unittitle: Salaries/wages invoices, vouchers, checks, receipts, and list of farm workers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Names include Henry Clark, blacksmith (colored), Joe Graham (colored), George James (colored), Charles Oldham (colored), Hiliard Robinson, market man (colored), Henry Richardson, carpenter, brickmaker (colored), June Russell (colored), and Mary Bowman.
